text: She would not suffer this Injustice!
She would lead her undead horde in this world of madness bereft of justice or sanity!
She had robbed the graveyard of three of its strongest corpses.
Men of courage and honor in life: they would serve her as abominable knights in undeath...
While she couldn't speak to them with words, her thoughts acted as orders to them.
She would take over the kingdom and restore order.
She was a little necromancer and none would stand in her way.
Though her soul was already damned, she would overcome this atrocity.
She would be the princess of death!
